vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.47;
son of Caleb (H3612H) and Jahdai (H3056);
brother of: Jotham (H3147I), Geshan (H1529), Pelet (H6404), Ephah (H5891I) and Shaaph (H8174)
§ Regem = "friend"
son of Jahdai and descendant of Caleb
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Caleb; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
利健 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "朋友"
迦勒的後裔, 雅代的兒子 (代上 2:47)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
利健 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "朋友"
迦勒的后裔, 雅代的儿子 (代上 2:47)
